snippet: Neighbors say Dwayne Mitchell is kind to children, but prosecutors say he has controlled the crack cocaine trade in a dangerous part of Manhattan for more than a decade.
abstract: Prosecutors say Dwayne Mitchell has been head of lucrative crack cocaine drug ring in Lower Manhattan for more than a decade, even while neighbors viewed him as kind and affable man; Mitchell and 10 others are charged with second-degree conspiracy for their role in drug trade, and with multiple counts of selling drugs; Mitchell is also charged with money laundering.
lead_paragraph: Neighbors say Dwayne Mitchell is kind to children, but prosecutors say he has controlled the crack cocaine trade in a dangerous part of Manhattan for more than a decade.

headline.main: 11 Charged in Lower Manhattan Drug Ring
headline.print_headline: 11 Charged in Lower Manhattan Drug Ring
